Software Engineer.description: Design, develop, and maintain software systems and applications. Work across various domains like web development, mobile apps, AI systems, and enterprise software.
Software Engineer.market: High demand with 20%+ growth expected. Opportunities in IT services, product companies, startups.
roadmap: Crack JEE/State CET for B.Tech CSE or pursue BCA
Build projects and contribute to GitHub

Data Scientist.description: Extract insights from complex data using statistical analysis, machine learning, and data visualization techniques.
Data Scientist.market: Rapidly growing field with high demand across industries like finance, healthcare, e-commerce.

Doctor.description: Medical professional diagnosing and treating illnesses, injuries, and providing healthcare services to patients.
Doctor.market: Always in demand with stable career prospects. Opportunities in hospitals, clinics, research.
roadmap: Crack NEET-UG to secure MBBS seat
Clear NEET-PG or INI CET for specialization
Complete MD/MS + residency for roles such as Neurosurgeon, Cardiologist, etc.

Neurosurgeon: MCh / DNB Super Specialization in Neurosurgery
Nurse: Qualify entrance for B.Sc. Nursing / GNM
Clear state nursing council exams + internship

Pharmacist.description: Dispense medicines, counsel patients on correct usage, manage drug inventory, and ensure regulatory compliance in retail or clinical settings.
Pharmacist.salary: ₹3-12 LPA (Retail: ₹3-6 LPA, Hospital: ₹4-8 LPA, Industry/Senior Roles: ₹8-12 LPA)
Pharmacist.market: Steady demand across hospitals, retail chains, government health centers, and pharmaceutical companies.
cons: Need to stay updated with drug changes

paths.title: Retail / Community Pharmacist
paths.description: Open your own medical store or manage a chain pharmacy. Handle prescriptions, inventory, and patient guidance.

paths.title: Hospital / Clinical Pharmacist
paths.description: Work with doctors inside hospitals to prepare and dispense medications, monitor drug interactions, and support patient recovery.

paths.title: Pharmaceutical Industry Specialist
paths.description: Join pharma manufacturing, quality assurance, medical coding, or drug safety teams with opportunities for rapid growth.

paths.title: Government & Regulatory Services
paths.description: Clear Drug Inspector or government health department exams to oversee compliance, licensing, and public drug programs.

roadmap: Appear for state CET/entrance for D.Pharm or B.Pharm
Complete internship + register with State Pharmacy Council
Optionally pursue M.Pharm/Pharm.D for advanced roles
For own shop: obtain drug license + GST + setup approvals
For government roles: clear Drug Inspector/Pharmacist exams

Digital Marketer.description: Create campaigns and strategies to promote brands online through SEO, social media, content marketing, and paid advertising.
Digital Marketer.market: High demand in digital-first businesses, agencies, and e-commerce companies.
cons: Need to stay updated with trends
roadmap: Pursue BBA/MBA or digital marketing certifications
Learn SEO, Google Ads, social media platforms

Graphic Designer.description: Create branding, visuals, ads, UI and multimedia assets using design software and creative principles.
Graphic Designer.market: High demand in advertising agencies, branding firms, and digital media companies.
roadmap: Start with internships or freelance projects
Specialize in UI/UX or brand identity

Business Manager.description: Oversee business operations, manage teams, and drive organizational growth and strategy.
Business Manager.market: Consistent demand across all industries. Essential for organizational success.
roadmap: Pursue BBA or relevant bachelor's degree
